reviewHighlights.text: A game from last century that showcases some of the magic of that time: mixing different genres and mixing everything with FMV. This was mind blowing...
I think this has aged well. I played it briefly on a friend's PC waaay back in 1997 or so. While the controls are dated and clunky by today's standard...
